title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, and tool-callers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to any local Ollama model via its REST API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with synchronous, asynchronous, and reactive (RxJava) APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API for Rails and scripting use.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and CLI toolbox (chat, batch benchmark, model conversion) built on the Go client.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET SDK with async/await, streaming, and dependency-injection friendly client.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models inside buffers—refactor, explain, generate code on demand.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open-WebUI, and GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model caching.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate exposing typed endpoints for chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that wraps chat interfaces around Ollama for quick internal ML demos.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify orchestration platform integration adding Ollama as a local model provider for no-code LLM apps.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated registry of GGUF conversions and custom Modelfiles for niche/domains.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot bringing local Ollama models into servers with slash commands and roles.
